src:
Helen Mirren and Ian McKellen act out Trump's Ukraine call
07 Nov 2019, 16:48 by Mark Frauenfelder



Watch two of the world's greatest living actors play the role of Donald Trump in his now infamous extortion phone call with Volodymyr Zelensky.
